thread.title: Sinead Howard
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Sinead Howard

author: Sinead Howard
title: Sinead Howard
text: I recently ordered a top at a Lifestyle Sports store as they didn't stock my size and I wanted it delivered to another Lifestyle Sports store. The sales assistant facilitated this. I received regular updates via text about my order and when it would be delivered to the store of my choice. Customer service at the pick-up store was very good. I was impressed with the service I received.
